Title: The Broad
Description: The Broad is a contemporary art museum on Grand Avenue in Downtown Los Angeles. The museum is named for philanthropists Eli and Edythe Broad, who financed the $140 million building that houses the Broad art collections. It offers free general admission to its permanent collection galleries.
Address:
221 S. Grand Avenue,
Los Angeles, CA 90012
